news.title: Heavy Traffic on MG Road Due to Metro Construction
news.description: Traffic congestion reported on MG Road due to ongoing metro construction work. Commuters advised to take alternative routes.

news.title: New Traffic Signal System Implemented at Silk Board Junction
news.description: Smart traffic signal system installed to improve traffic flow at the busy Silk Board junction.

news.title: Road Closure on Bannerghatta Road
news.description: Bannerghatta Road closed for maintenance work between 10 PM and 5 AM for the next three days.

news.title: Traffic Diversion on Outer Ring Road
news.description: Traffic diverted on Outer Ring Road due to ongoing flyover construction. Alternative routes suggested.

news.title: New Bus Lane Implementation
news.description: Dedicated bus lanes implemented on major corridors to improve public transport efficiency.

news.title: Heavy Rainfall Expected in Bengaluru
news.description: IMD predicts heavy rainfall with 80% probability across Bengaluru. Commuters advised to avoid waterlogged areas and plan travel accordingly.

news.title: Flood Warning for Low-Lying Areas
news.description: Flood warning issued for low-lying areas including Koramangala, Indiranagar, and parts of Whitefield due to continuous rainfall.

news.title: Thunderstorm Alert for Evening Hours
news.description: Thunderstorm with lightning expected between 4 PM to 8 PM. Avoid outdoor activities and seek shelter if caught outside.

news.title: Visibility Reduced Due to Fog
news.description: Dense fog reported on major highways leading to Bengaluru. Motorists advised to drive with caution and use headlights.

news.title: Temperature Drop Expected
news.description: Significant temperature drop expected over the next 24 hours. Minimum temperature may reach 18°C with high humidity.
